item.description:
I was told this week that Ethiopian food is excellent, and Lalibela was recommended by the New Haven contingency. It's cheap, great food, and has an entire vegetarian/vegan menu for the plant eaters in the group.

I'm scheduling this well in advance since New Haven is a drive for many of you. (By the way, there is free parking near the restaurant.)

Their website: http://www.lalibelare...

For more information, see http://www.lalibelare...

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: A Taste of Africa--Lalibela in New Haven
